ExpSyntax.val: 'order by CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO FOR FETCH ONLY'
'where exists ( select * from '&Trim({32768,9})&'/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and ADMU_HUSR_ID = '&''''&Upper(User(0))&''''&' and ADMU_ALLOW_QUERY_CLIENT = '&''''&'Y'&''''&')'
